text: The Backstreet Boys joined Jimmy Fallon and The Roots on ‘ The Tonight Show’ for a performance of “I Want It That Way.” The group used classroom instruments to give the hit song a new sound.
title: Jimmy Fallon, Backstreet Boys & The Roots Sing “I Want It That Way” (Classroom Instruments) | ‘Tonight Show’
